name: Borrowed Time
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You reanimate the corpse of a creature within range and allow its soul to re-enter its body. Its maximum hit points are fully restored, and its current hit points are set equal to half its maximum hit points. You can impose conditions on the creature's ability to act when you cast this spell, but the creature is otherwise free to act as they please.

When the spell ends, the creature must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a success, their maximum hit points are reduced to 1, and they remain alive but no longer reanimated. On a failure, they die.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points while affected by this spell has their body begin to disintegrate. Unless they are brought back to life, the body will vanish after 1 hour.
